channel.title: Help! Server wont start
channel.description:
Heya all im new to this forums and it really rocks, but i got a question: Ive downloaded Testscape (because im new to private servers i started with testscape) and read the ultimate tutorial. Now whenever i double click the Runserver.bat it says: Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 and then it just leaves it like that for ages. I dont see any window with the log in screen of testscape... So how do i start the server?
thanks in advance
greetz
-Jurgen-

item.title: Help! Server wont start
item.dc:creator: @Jurgen Jurgen
item.description:
@Jurgen wrote:

Nah it cant be my router because its a local server lol
(btw i got McAfee Firewall)

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server wont start
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“Jurgen, post:10, topic:65040”]Yay sometimes its working to get on my server but its verrrryyyyyy laggy!
Any way to fix this?
I’ve got good internet connection and good computer so that isnt causing the problem…
But thx for the help so far, it really helped! :D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 12:51:23 PM[/size][hr]Yes it compiles without any error[/quote]

your firewall perhaps? maybe your router is blocking all traffic.

Read full topic

But thx for the help so far, it really helped! :D[br][size=1]Posted on: March 06, 2007, 12:51:23 PM[/size][hr]Yes it compiles without any error atleast i think, it says:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . (Press any key to continue :P)

item.title: Help! Server wont start
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

[quote=“Jurgen, post:6, topic:65040”]Ok i get it, but when i press the testscape runner.bat and log in i get logged out directly again…
This is what my batch window say:

Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2062
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 24834679
darkgstar has signed onto server.
Game saved for player darkgstar
ClientHandler: Client darkgstar disconnected.[/quote]

does your server compile with no errors?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! Server wont start
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

testscape client? you dotn need that to run it… rofl… you download the mopar client… run that, then a log in box will appear, just like runescape and you just enter your details in the ip bit, make your name and pass.
